context: Hi, what genre of movie do you like?
Hello there I'm trying to think of movies that I like. I like a drama, thriller, sometimes something scary. I have seen Happy Death Day (2017) and that was okay
Have you seen the one set thrillers, like Room (2005) and Saw (2004) ? Buried (2010) is like those too.
oh yeah, Saw (2004) , I just got the whole series Buried (2010), is that with ryan Reynolds?
The timeline gets pretty jumbled near the end. Yes!
I love that movie, but I never found someone else who does.
Did you see The Bye Bye Man (2017) ? I was thinking about checking that out.
No, I heard bad review about it though.
oh. hmm. don't know what to watch.
resp: I'd recommend the Room (2005) series. Have a good one!
